summary: This bill, the Tornado and Windstorm Innovation for Safety and Tracking Enhancement Research Act (TWISTER Act), amends the Weather Research and Forecasting Innovation Act of 2017. It expands the goals of the tornado warning improvement and extension program to focus on developing innovative tornado forecasts, predictions, and warnings, particularly for fast-developing storm systems like derechos, areas historically absent of tornadoes, and evening/nighttime tornadoes. The bill aims to improve public safety by enhancing the accuracy and reach of severe weather warnings.
